Title: Phantoms
Writer: Dean R. Koontz (novel), Dean R. Koontz (screenplay)
Actors: Peter O'Toole, Rose McGowan, Joanna Going, Liev Schreiber
Plot: In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, it's up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.
Production: NEO Motion Pictures, Miramax Films, Fuji Creative Corporation, Dimension Films, Raven House
